snippet: Prime Minister Enrico Letta of Italy won a confidence vote in the Senate, confirming his government’s majority after promising sweeping overhauls and urging lawmakers to back him or risk chaos.
abstract: Italy's Prime Min Enrico Letta wins a confidence vote in the Senate, confirming his government’s majority after promising sweeping overhauls and urging lawmakers to back him or risk chaos.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Enrico Letta of Italy won a confidence vote in the Senate, confirming his government’s majority after promising sweeping overhauls and urging lawmakers to back him or risk chaos.
